trigger.title: Trigger: Enchanted Item
trigger.description: Triggers after the player enchants an item through an enchanting table (does not get triggered through an anvil, or through commands).

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

item.title: Item
item.description: The item after it has been enchanted.

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: The levels spent by the player on the enchantment.
